Summary



Reliance Capital to be excluded from BSE 100, 200, 500 indexes from Sept 5Crompton to be included in BSE100, Indiabulls Real in BSE 200 from Sept 5

Minda Industries to acquire 60 percent stake in MI Torica India for Rs 8.80 croreHitech Corporation Q1 profit down 78 percent to Rs 0.7 crore from Rs 3.2 crore






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, gained 59.50 points to 9,847.50.Here are the stocks to watch out for in Wednesday’s session:
title: Stocks To Watch: Tata Power, Ujjivan Financial Services, Reliance Capital
